Friend and Lord São Lourenço, March 1, 1843.

In December I wrote to you and sent all my documents by a messenger whom I sent there, to Your Grace Senhor D. Miguel Garcia; I hope that my friend will do me this great favor, with which he will greatly oblige

His old and obliged friend Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu

Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic To the deputy Domingos José de Almeida Alegrete.

Answered on April 14, 1843
